biography_text: RENACCI, Jim, a Representative from Ohio; born in Monongahela, Washington County, Pa., December 3, 1958; graduated from Ringgold High School, Monongahela, Pa., 1976; B.S., Indiana University of Pennsylvania, Indiana, Pa., 1980; business owner; member of the Wadsworth, Ohio, board of zoning appeals, 1994-1995; Wadsworth, Ohio, city council president, 1999-2003; mayor of Wadsworth, Ohio, 2004-2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the three succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2011-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Indiana University of Pennsylvania, Indiana, Pa.
